description:
A yearning to create, to write an answer song. To speak of love as it is incorporated, the writing forth of something like a feeling into existence, from the void.

Written 24 September 2020.

A space for books to breathe, even after they close. Where words are scratched, smudged, written, erased, projected, spoken, thought of.

Written 24 July 2020.
cta: To get in touch, find me on any of these alleyways:
